resources.string: Looks like you have an LTE only SIM card. To make sure it works normally, set it as default for mobile data. Set now?
"SIM %1$s only supports LTE. When SIM %2$s isn't your default SIM for mobile data, SIM card might not work normally. Switch now?"
Allow LTE connectivity for both SIM slots
VoLTE requires LTE connectivity for both SIM slots. Switch to Dual LTE now?
Looks like you have an LTE only SIM card. Dual LTE was turned on automatically.
SIM %1$s only supports LTE. To make sure your SIM card works normally, dual LTE was turned on.
Use VoLTE to improve the quality of voice calls
